page.title: 20POPULATION IN L.STAUGHTON
page.content: The{population}of Little Staughton has grown during the last decade.As train and road services have improved so people have found it possibe to live in attractive surroundings whilst working in London or other conurbations.The present trend of London firms to site some of their offices in{Bedford and Milton {Keynes}is enabling many more people to live in North Bedfordshire villages without spending a disproportionate amount of time in travelling.The population is fairly mobile with some houses changing ownership every 4-5 years. In the Lower School, out of a roll of 36 only 3 children are second generation. The work on this block has been completed by the Chairman of Governors, Staff and Junior children of{Kymbrook Lower School.
